title: Life expectancy at birth in Germany 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Life expectancy at birth in years. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Life expectancy at birth in years has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Life expectancy at birth in years, of value 81.09 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Life expectancy at birth in years, of value 79.53 was reported at Year 2007
